content: this is a self drafted recipe based on the oversized cable knit sweater rory wears in the pilot episode of gilmore girls it is knitted flat bottom-up and seamed at the end using mattress stitch the collar is worked in the round this is my first time writing a recipe and it is a little loose so feel free to reach out if more info is needed gauge 18 stitches x 24 row in moss stitch = 4 in / 10 cm materials 17 skeins drops nepal in shade off white 50 g = 75m / 82 yd 850g total = 1275m / 1394 yd or any similar yarn us 7 4 5mm knitting needles us 9 5 5mm knitting needles cable needle finished measurements bust 48 length 25 5 measured from center back not including collar sleeve length 20 5 including ribbing 14 positive ease shown in photos the easiest way to make this sweater larger or smaller is to add or subtract moss stitches from the ends of each panel this pattern can be made to measure *small changes are progressively made to pattern as i edit make sure to re-download most recent version before you start your own this is the only place this knitting pattern has been posted it is free and if you see it for sale on another site it is not mine
